sagarika disanayakasancharaka karmanthaye wishishtayinta sammana pirinamena sancharaka sammana (2011) ulela labana juli masaye di pawathwimata shri lanka sancharanaya katayuthu yoda atha.pas wani warata pawathwena mewara sammana ulelehi di sancharaka kshethrayata adala ansha ekolahak yatathe sammana haththawak piriname.mewara wisheshathwaya wanne pasugiya wasarata wada aluth kshethra 21 k wenuwen sammana pirinamimaya.

mema pitasakwala jiwin yatathe awasana washayen ma katha kirimata balaporoththu wanne mema pitasakwala jiwin dutu awastha,pitasakwala jiwin paminenawa yayi kiyawena piyabana pirisi dutu awastha ganayi.
pasugiya 08da pawathi brithanya parlimenthu mathiwaranayen manthriwariyan 208 deneku path wi nawa warthawak pihituwa thibe. 2015 mathiwaranayen pathwa sitiye manthriwariyan 196ki.
meya udaharanayakin mese dakwiya haki we.

ara mamala banalata dennath ithin hithn hari kiyannema " jara ganu mun mokata mara gannawada, monawa beda ganna baruwada"kumbainan (duka maraya wage hithawathun ara, mokada un denna mada eksportarlane ) meka balala mata kiyayi umbaa ohoma unata api na.

heta thawa kawuru hari thorayi..namuth eeka harima widiya kiyala mama hithanne naha.mage blog eka udata awith thibima gana mama sathutu wenawa.eeth apita ayithiyak thiyenawada ee de karanna kiyana eka matanan gataluwak.

ema katayuthu saha dharmanushasanawa sidu kale, solosmasthana bharakara pujya kandakatiye aththadassi himiyan wisin.udasana 7.30ta poda dharma deshanaya, labunoruwa kanda aaranya senasanadhipathi pujya kothmale kumara kassapa himiyan wisin sidu kirimata niyamithayi.emenma, wishesha dharma sakachchawakda perawaru 08.30 sita 10.00 dakwa pawathwenne pujya walpola gothama saha pujya hasalaka silawimala yana himiwarunge sahabhagithwayen.anathuruwa kawya wisharada pujya mampitiye sirisumana himiyan kawyamaya dharma deshanawa pawathwimata niyamitha athara, dahawal 3.30ta thawath wishesha dharma sakachchawak da pawathwenu athi.
jathidrohi, deshadrohi balawathhu lada lada thanin jathiyak deshayak ka damathi.
anathuruwa eya aprel 06, sanduda perawaru 6.00 dakwa kriyathmaka bawa janadhipathi karyalaya kiyayi.
ee gedarata gena tiwi ekath apema bhukthiyata sawi wuna .
upadeshana kamitu 25kata nowadi wiya yuthuya.meya pawathna amathyansha sankhyawata samana wiya yuthuya.
namak nathi ayata ayithi podu nirnamika handlarayakin oba aawama sanwadayak kirima apahasuyi mokada anika ayath ekama yoda ganna nisa.
sinhala lori ratha riyadurekuta bimath muslim tharunayin pirisak paharadi athi athara thuwala hethuwen marthu 3 dina riyaduru maranayata path wiya.
aarambhaye di mathdrawya bhawithayen thorawa rata surakshitha kara ganime aramunen mathin nidahas wime prathignyawa laba dima sidu keruna.

atha giyama gaha langin iwathwanne.

pasugiya maha mathiwaranayedi rajayak pihituwima sandaha janawarama labune ejapayata bawath ee anuwa kabinat sanshodhanayak sidukaranne nam ema thiranaya ejapaya sathu bawath agamathiwaraya raswimedi awadharanaya kara atha.

wisheshayenma mema wachanawala arthayan api apata galapena lesa, mathu pitin penena karunu mahela jayawardhana yanu nalanda widyalaye wasara anuwaka ithihasaya thula bihi kala wishishta ganaye aadi shishyayeki.
ese karaddith wasarakadi rupiyale agaya dawantha lesa siyayata dahayakin pamana awapramanaya wuni.

ee yatathe sanwardhana nyaya pathraya kriyathmaka kirima sandaha awashya mulya sthawarathwaya godanaga ganima wenuwen rajya anshaye kalamanakarithwaya saha paudgalika anshaye tharagakarithwaya wardhanaya kara ganimata awashya watapitawa sakas kere.

ee kale ampara sa. a. karyale departhamenthuwe masika aadayama laksha hathalihata withara ihala giya.
api ethana thotupalen nalath thiyenawa issara .
man mongal pat ekata hinawela ahaka balagannawa..

ee aruthin gath kala amarasekarage ‘‘podu purushaya’’ pilibanda ‘‘wicharayen’’ peni yanne yatharthaya ha pa්rabandhaya athara nirmashili sambandhaya therum ganimata apa athara sitina wishishtathama sahithyakaruwa kanagatudayaka lesa asamath wi athi bawayi.
dimo wethin sapayena wishishta alewiyen pasu sewawa saha diwayina pura pahasuwen amathara kotas labaganimata athi hakiyawa mehi athi thawath wisheshathawan ya.
passe eyage kathawe wachana yatin iri andala nawatha wimasannatath sindawuna.
ithin mama meken godak dewal igana gaththa.
ithin apita baha katawath wisheshathwayak dakwanna .
ayiyage aadare labanna ee akkita samahara wita pin madi wenna athi..ane manda monawa kiyannada kiyalawath hithaganna ba ayiye..monawa wunath ayiyage aadare lassanayi....
haritha pa thana pitiya kisith nowu ganata yali aluth wiya.
amda monawa kiwwath samindige pahadili wenasak man dakka.
ayi kawe naththe??
ee guruwaraya nanda nam wiya.nanda jiwath wuye maha paren sathapum kalak pamana durin wu niwasaka ya.
nodanna godak dewal danagaththa...

methana aththatama me tharunayin dedena nonawathwa bayisikalaya padawagena giyada, nathnam ihatha dewana siddhiye wage polisiya samanga gatumak athi kara gena ehi prathipalayak se polisiya wedi thabuwada.
mema roga lakshana pilikawak nowana roga thaththwawaladi da athi wiya haki bawin mewa dutu wita sudusukam lath waidyawarayaku ge upades labaganima sudusu ya.

e් wenuwata rupawahiniyen danwimwalin antharjalayen ape olu athulata ringawapu kisima pala pa්rayojanayak nathi, lassana nam tikak witharak thiyena, sangawuna maha anathurak thiyena shaka tikak ape pochchiwalata, ape gewaththata api salli dila aragena aawa.
eekath sundara athitha mathakayak witharayi.
meke ek awasthawak thiyenawa wahina.
yaluwanta powala meka foto gannawa wage...

enna athule sofa ekata gihin wadi wemu..

diwayinama aawaranaya wana paridi sewa pahasukama
oya ingi therum aragena thiyanawa hondatama waradiyi.
ee wagema mama hithanawa me githaya ahuwata passe api ammala ekka thibunu ganudenuwen api aath wela hitiyanam, api amma gana hoyala balana eka, ammata salakana eka gana hithayi kiyala.
ane kattiya thawa hitiya.
chandaya pama wimata erehiwa parata bahinawa kiyala.
ane ane ayiye...
meya athi prabalayi.
namuth shariraye athi thuwalayak nopenennata redi patiyakin welu pamanin eya suwa yayi salakannata puluwanda?

ema layisthuwe sesu wasthun athara: barlinhi eejipthu kauthukagaraye athi suprakata nefartitige udukaya, jarmaniye hildeshayimhi romar-and-peliseyas-kauthukagaraya thula thaba athi maha piramidaye wasthu widyagnyaya wu hemiyunuge prathimawa, parisiye luwarhi athi dendera dewole rashi chakraya saha bostan lalitha kala kauthukagaraye athi ankhhafge udukaya ruwa wani purawasthun athulath wiya.[73]

ma laba dun sankhya boru nowana bawa soya baluwoth oppu wewi.
ansathu dewal nokiya aragena yama sambandhayen.

ee nisa sahodarayini, aththata ma mata dolar labenne natha.
mama epa kiyala kiwwa.
“oya heta ape gedara enawada?” “ethakota mahaththaya….” “eya heta aatha gamanak yanawa.”
sathiyak giya, wisandumak na.
bere gedara ayinen basayakata godawenna inna oonama kenekuta awwatath wassatath pihitata inne katu mal pandurak witharayi.
dawasa nam aaya mare maru..
giye ayida yanna ohuwath nodanna karunak wiya hakiya.
uthure pasal wasayi.
lekam wanawa yayi ki dayan gomas upaka්ramashiliwa ho madakata tharagayen iwath wi atha.
me githaya hondinma rasawindinna puluwan oya hangima hithe pirila ithirila thiyenakota thamayi.
namuth, dan mahindage pohottuwa pupurannata patangena athi bawa janaka bandaragen heli wanneya.
wena kisima widiyakin salli hoyala naha.
me hethuwen ema margaye ratha wahana dhawanayata da dadi badha ellawi atha.
anika meka lama chithrapatayak.
wandi laba dimedi da atham piris wetha wandi nolabunu bawath, paharaka madhyawedinta wandi labunath alabha hani wu upakarana wenuwen wandiyak laba nodun bawath owuhu kiha.

methuwak kal abhiyogayata lak nowu ema palahadu wiyunuwath ee kuliyata liyannath ohu wa ethana palapadiyam kala kolugataya aa sillara pragnygnyayantath kanata gasa, kuli liyannawa wibhagayata lak kara prashna kara nisi thana thabimata apa sama ek wemu!

oyage yaluwontath enna kiyanna
abhiyogaya pili nogena maha kalu sinhalaya danatmath parajaya wela awasanayi.
thilini henndahewa saha kawindi ishadika wisin wata 2-0 k lesa achini rathnasiri saha hasini ambalangodage parajaya karana ladaha. (21/09, 22/20)
mama eeka danagaththe api gedara giyata passe!
"ethakota ara pena sudu pata gedarada maha gedara?"
me athara shri lankawe pihiti amarikanu thanapathi karyalaya twitar satahanak thabamin sandahan kale shri lankawata athwindinnata wu wedanawa amarikanuwanda bedahadaganna bawayi.

mema wyapruthiya mangin sidukarana lada gaweshana mangin hamu wu purawidyathmaka watinakamin yuth bhanda ha upakarana rasak me wanawita galla kotuwe sthapitha kara athi muhudu pura widya kauthukagaraye thanpath kara thibe.
ewun obata kiya di athnam oba mawupiyan kiyana de pawa noasana kalakanni apathayeki .
an kawara ho prathicharayak eya samakami, prajathanthrawadi, nithimaya ho wyawasthamaya wewa deshapremaya darunu lesa kelesimak yayi saka karenu atha.

ohu wisin dharmasiri bandaranayaka tharuna sinamawediyage hansa wilak chithrapataya sandaha rachanakarana lada hemin sare piya wida githaya merata chithrapata gi athara wishishtathama gi kihipaya atharata ekwa athi bawa awiwadithaya.

sanchithayata thora ganu labana kridaka sankhyawa 30 k we.
dan balan gedara inna kale horen sigarat bona eke mara kik ekak thibune.

gammuladaniwarun lesa palanayata gam pradhanin path karaddi gam pradesha kipayakata gammuladaniwarunge pradhaniyaku lesa widanarachchi keneku path keruni.giruwapaththuwe nayakathwayata mese path kerunu don dawith rajapaksha (widanarachchi ralahami) pradeshaye gaurawadarayata path wu ewanima pawulakin wadihiti aashirwadayen sahakariyaka laba ganuni.

tharindu polisiyata kotuwanne in pasuwa ya.tharindu ෙgan prashna kirimedi ohu kisiwak muladi nokiwada pasuwa papochcharanayak karamin alakata dama thibu ulpihiya da polisiyata penwa dunne ya.“ayi me wage thirisan wadak kale...

enam lingika athawara walata goduru wu nonasi jiwathwana ayata adala garuthwaya laba diya yuthu bawath owunta mema aparadaya siduwuye owungema rakawaranayata sitina ayagen bawath oostreliyanu agamathi wadi duratath pawasuweya.
ohu apage athwala galwu kurundu thel binduwe sisilasa saha suwandawath bhawaya hawas yamaya thekma pawathi nisa ema nishpadanawala gunathmakabhawaya itha ihala yayi apata sithini.

ma mese lankawa dekata bedanne minissunta minissunta awashya sewawan pahasuwen ganna wani enam drayiwin layisan eka ganna eka, paspot ganna eka, ayidentiya ganna wani minissunta awashya sewawan sapaya ganima pahasu karana paripalana aramunu sandahawath balaya wimadhyagatha kirima nam sankalpaya sakshath karaganima sandahawath nowana bawa mulinma sandahan kala yuthuya.
anthime lokuhamuduruwo ahapu prashneta latha gen prathicharayak nathi thana liyanamahaththaya kata ariya.
